part.content: CHAPTER II : RIGHT TO INFORMATION AND OBLIGATIONS OF PUBLIC AUTHORITIES. Sec. 3 - 11.
CHAPTER III : THE CENTRAL INFORMATION COMMISSION. Sec. 12 - 14.
CHAPTER IV : THE STATE INFORMATION COMMISSION. Sec. 15 - 17.
CHAPTER V : POWERS AND FUNCTIONS OF THE INFORMATION COMMISSIONSAPPEAL AND PENALTIES. Sec. 18 - 20.
